# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_ENTITY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_entity STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_entity PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_entity
        LINK_PUBLIC
        EnTT
        minecpp_api_proto
        minecpp_api_nbt
        minecpp_game
        minecpp_random
        minecpp_repository
        minecpp_math
        minecpp_utils
)

add_subdirectory("test")
